statements: SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM machinery_sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id, sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM machinery_sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC, sensor_value ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%'
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value, sensor_type FROM machinery_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(sensor_type) > 5
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM machinery_sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id, sensor_type ORDER BY total_sensors DESC
SELECT MAX(sensor_value), MIN(sensor_value), AVG(sensor_value), sensor_type FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'vibration'
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM machinery_sensors WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM machinery_sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, last_reading_timestamp FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Thermal';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_status = 'Pending' AND maintenance_type = 'Calibration';
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY last_reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM machinery_sensors WHERE location = 'Factory A' AND sensor_type = 'Vibration';
SELECT schedule_id, sensor_id, schedule_date, maintenance_status FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, last_reading_timestamp FROM machinery_sensors WHERE last_reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM machinery_data
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM machinery_data ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT machinery_name, location FROM machinery_details WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_name, location FROM machinery_details WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%'
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM machinery_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_name FROM machinery_details WHERE location LIKE '%Factory%' ORDER BY machinery_name ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE machinery_id = 3 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_name, location FROM machinery_details WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY machinery_name DESC;
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_name, location, installation_date FROM machinery_details WHERE machinery_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensors;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, location FROM machinery_sensors ORDER BY machine_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM machinery_sensors WHERE reading > 100;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer, last_maintenance FROM machine_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date, technician FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, reading FROM machinery_sensors WHERE machine_id = 101 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM machine_details JOIN maintenance_history ON machine_details.machine_id = maintenance_history.machine_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND completed_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, machine_id, recorded_at, location FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%'
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, manufacturer, install_date FROM machine_details WHERE manufacturer IN ('Brand1', 'Brand2', 'Brand3') ORDER BY install_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, install_date, last_maintenance FROM machine_details WHERE install_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensor_data;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, manufacturer FROM machinery_details;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT machine_id, log_type, log_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT machine_id, failure_type, failure_date FROM machinery_failure_logs WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM machinery_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_value > 50 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM machinery_details WHERE year_of_production < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Manufacturing' ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, machine_id, log_type, log_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_type = 'scheduled' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT machine_id, failure_type, failure_date FROM machinery_failure_logs WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY machine_id, failure_date ASC LIMIT 20;
